name: @wiotp/sdk
description: A library for developing device and application clients for IBM Watson IoT Platform

scripts.build:bundle: npm run build:bundle:app && npm run build:bundle:device && npm run build:bundle:gateway
scripts.build:min: npm run build:min:app && npm run build:min:device && npm run build:min:gateway
scripts.build:min:app: browserify src/wiotp/sdk/application/index.js -t babelify -s wiotp.sdk.application | uglifyjs > dist/wiotp-sdk-app-bundle.min.js
scripts.build:min:device: browserify src/wiotp/sdk/device/index.js -t babelify -s wiotp.sdk.device | uglifyjs > dist/wiotp-sdk-device-bundle.min.js
scripts.build:min:gateway: browserify src/wiotp/sdk/gateway/index.js -t babelify -s wiotp.sdk.gateway | uglifyjs > dist/wiotp-sdk-gateway-bundle.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:min
